weight=00682404-v (present with a bias; \""He biased his presentation so as to please the share holders\"");01489937-v (weight down with a load);04578374-n (an artifact that is heavy);04578578-n (sports equipment used in calisthenic exercises and weightlifting; it is not attached to anything and is raised and lowered by use of the hands and arms);05034009-n (the vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity);05179849-n (the relative importance granted to something; \""his opinion carries great weight\""; \""the progression implied an increasing weightiness of the items listed\"");07554200-n (an oppressive feeling of heavy force; \""bowed down by the weight of responsibility\"");13610524-n ((statistics) a coefficient assigned to elements of a frequency distribution in order to represent their relative importance);13630031-n (a unit used to measure weight; \""he placed two weights in the scale pan\"");13737860-n (a system of units used to express the weight of something

determine=00699355-v (reach, make, or come to a decision about something; \""We finally decided after lengthy deliberations\"");00701581-v (fix conclusively or authoritatively; \""set the rules\"");00702474-v (fix in scope; fix the boundaries of; \""the tree determines the border of the property\"");00702806-v (shape or influence; give direction to; \""experience often determines ability\""; \""mold public opinion\"");00765444-v (settle conclusively; come to terms; \""We finally settled the argument\"");00920843-v (establish after a calculation, investigation, experiment, survey, or study; \""find the product of two numbers\""; \""The physicist who found the elusive particle won the Nobel Prize\"");00922307-v (find out, learn, or determine with certainty, usually by making an inquiry or other effort; \""I want to see whether she speaks French\""; \""See whether it works\""; \""find out if he speaks Russian\""; \""Check whether the train leaves on time\"");00949109-v (decide upon or fix definitely; \""fix the variables\""; \""specify the parameters\""

senses.definition: The process of determining a competitor's body weight prior to an event, especially to ensure it is within the weight restrictions
